title: Upheavals and Downswings in the 2020 Democratic Primary Race | Mark Ruffalo
itunes:title: Upheavals and Downswings in the 2020 Democratic Primary Race | Mark Ruffalo
description:
Trevor covers updates in the Democratic primary race, Michael Kosta defends Joe Biden's "No Malarkey" slogan, and Mark Ruffalo talks about his movie "Dark Waters."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
